snippet: Using a Nikon 35-mm film camera, Cooper Neill created these double exposures at Monday night’s national championship college football game in Arlington, Tex.
abstract: New York Times photographer Cooper Neill creates double exposure photos at inaugural College Football Playoff National Championship game between Ohio State and Oregon.
lead_paragraph: Using a Nikon 35-mm film camera, Cooper Neill created these double exposures at Monday night’s national championship college football game in Arlington, Tex.
